item.title: US gives $20bn to Ukraine funded by seized Russian assets
item.description: The move means Russia is being forced to "bear the costs of its illegal war", the US Treasury said.

item.title: I hope Assad pays the price, says mother whose son's death inflamed 2011 Syrian revolution
item.description: Hamza al-Khatib, 13, was arrested at a 2011 anti-government rally and tortured - but Assad's downfall has not brought his family justice.

item.title: The global players in Syria before and after Assad
item.description: Global powers who have been involved in the 13-year civil war have a vested interest after Assad's fall.

item.title: Israel confirms attack on Syrian naval fleet
item.description: The BBC has verified videos showing blasts in the Syrian port of Latakia, as Israel conducts strikes across Syria.

item.title: Jamie Foxx reveals he had a stroke in 2023
item.description: The Hollywood star said he cannot remember the first 20 days following the stroke in April last year.
